schema.heading: JSON schema
schema.description: The JSON schema developed interactively in the user interface or uploaded from a file.

records.heading: Mock records
records.description: Mock records generated using the JSON schema together with the [OpenAI Structured Outputs API](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/structured-outputs/supported-schemas) to create schema-aligned data records

texts.heading: Mock texts
texts.description: Mock texts generated from the mock records using a generative AI prompt designed to produce text output in a domain-specificr style and format
